page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE - CHILD
page.content: My name is William.I am 11 years old.I live at{Larkhall.}I get up at about 07.00.Watch Popeye on{television. Dress at 07.45,have breakfast,clean teeth and brush hair. Leave for school at 08.30 hours. Arrive there about 20 minutes later. School bell is rung at 08.55 Go into {Assembly}which is an act of{worship. Remainder of morning spent learning {Mathematics}&{Literacy.}After a break for lunch I take part in activities such as{Social Studies,Art & Craft, {Physical Education, Music or Science. Sometimes see{educational programmes on television.At breaktime play{"One {touch-all touch"-}a game for many where one has to avoid being touched. Leave school at 15.25,walk home, have tea,play with{bicycle.}Play {football}with friends.Talk to Mum & sister before bed at 21.00.
